Class Polynomial

  • java.lang.Object
    • Polynomial

  • public class Polynomial
extends java.lang.Object
    The Polynomial class stores polynomial with the terms of type PolyTerm and terms are ordered in canonical ordering (i.e. x^2 + xy + y^2).
    Author:
    Richard Bryann Chua Original code was developed by the Java Education Development Initiative (JEDI) team. Code was migrated to be able to handle exponents that are >= 0.
    See Also:
    PolyTerm

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Polynomial()
      Creates an empty polynomial
      Polynomial(PolyTerm h)
      Creates a new polynomial with head h

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Polynomial P)
      Performs the operation Q = P + Q, Q is [this] polynomial
      void insertTerm(PolyTerm p)
      Inserts a term to [this] polynomial by inserting in its proper location to maintain canonical form
      void multiply(Polynomial P, Polynomial Q)
      Performs the operation R = R + P*Q, where T is initially a zero polynomial and R is this polynomial
      void subtract(Polynomial P)
      Performs the operation Q = Q - P, Q is [this] polynomial
      java.lang.String toString()
      Display the polynomial

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • insertTerm

        public void insertTerm(PolyTerm p)
        Inserts a term to [this] polynomial by inserting in its proper location to maintain canonical form
        Parameters:
        p - - the polynomial term that is to be inserted into his polynomial

      • add

        public void add(Polynomial P)
        Performs the operation Q = P + Q, Q is [this] polynomial
        Parameters:
        P - - the polynomial that is to be added to this polynomial

      • subtract

        public void subtract(Polynomial P)
        Performs the operation Q = Q - P, Q is [this] polynomial
        Parameters:
        P - - the polynomial that is to be subtracted from this polynomial

      • multiply

        public void multiply(Polynomial P,
            Polynomial Q)
        Performs the operation R = R + P*Q, where T is initially a zero polynomial and R is this polynomial
        Parameters:
        P - - the polynomial that is to be multiplied
        Q - - the polynomial that is to be multiplied
